name: Chicken Jump (artnodes)
description:
Help a hen navigate through levels by steering clear of foxes,  jumping on moving platforms, avoiding spikes, pushing crates, and activating buttons, as she finds her way back home to her chicks.

---

NOTE: This is the first game I've ever made and it took me about 3 weeks. I also have no prior code experience, unless HTML  and CSS matters, so I heavily relied on some YouTube tutorials, some Reddit discussions, and the Godot documentation. Lastly, my main motivation in finishing this was to let my younger sister play it, so I hope you enjoy it as much as she does.

---

Graphics made on Inkscape. Game made on Godot.
